replies.body: Has Fox thought about broadcasting Worlds? That could be quite the selling point, considering the number of OCE players who follow NA and EU LCS's (listed in order of greatness, of course). And especially if OCE manages to beat Supermassive. That would be something.
That fox thing will be cool

Has Fox thought about broadcasting Worlds? That could be quite the selling point, considering the number of OCE players who follow NA and EU LCS's (listed in order of greatness, of course). And especially if OCE manages to beat Supermassive. That would be something.
